bibl.title: Polish-Egyptian Archaeological and Preservation Mission in Alexandria. Excavations at Kom el-Dikka 1997-1998. A Preliminary Report.
bibl.note: Excavations in different sectors of the site, and esp. in sector F (early Roman residential area).
bibl.seg: MAJCHEREK Grzegorz, Polish-Egyptian Archaeological and Preservation Mission in Alexandria. Excavations at Kom el-Dikka 1997-1998. A Preliminary Report.
ASAE 74 (1999) pp. 39-55, 3 profils, 5 plans et 5 pll.
Excavations in different sectors of the site, and esp. in sector F (early Roman residential area).
